titles.title: Gädlä ḥawaryat, Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles

shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Gädlä ḥawaryat, Apocryphal Acts of the Apostles (fols. 1ra-76vb) I-1) The Discourse of Dionysius on the Martyrdom of Sts. Peter and Paul (fols. 1ra-1vb, 27ra-27vb, 15ra-16vb, 28ra-28vb, 17ra-17vb, 33ra-33vb) I-2) The Preaching of St. Philip (fols. 47rb-47vb, 49ra-49vb, 2ra-2vb), incomplete I-3) The Acts of St. John the Son of Zebedee (fols. 23ra-23vb, 62ra-62vb, 3ra-4vb), incomplete I-4) The Acts of Sts. Andrew and Bartholomew (fols. 11rb-11vb, 29ra-29vb, 42ra-43vb, 32ra-32vb, 12ra-12vb, 6ra-6vb, 50ra-50vb, 20ra-21vb, 18ra-19ra) I-5) The Preaching of St. Matthias (fols. 7ra-7vb, 70ra-70va), incomplete I-6) The Acts of St. James the Son of Zebedee (fols. 40ra-41ra, 73ra-73vb, 8ra-8vb) I-7) Introduction (fol. 34ra-rb) I-8) The Preaching of St. Peter (fols. 34rb-39vb, 55ra-55vb, 9ra-10va), incomplete I-9) The Martyrdom of St. Peter (fols. 10va-10vb, 51ra-51vb, 14ra-14va) I-10) The Martyrdom of St. Simon the son of Cleopas, surnamed Judas or Nathaniel (fols. 13ra-13vb), incomplete I-11) The Preaching of St. James the Just (fol. 13vb), incomplete I-12) The Martyrdom of St. Paul (fols. 14va-14vb, 53ra-53vb, 52ra-52rb) I-13) The Martyrdom of St. Andrew (fols. 19ra-19vb, 22ra-22vb) I-14) The Preaching of St. Judas Thaddeus (fols. 30ra-30vb), incomplete I-15) The Martyrdom of St. Matthias (fols. 40ra-41ra), incomplete I-16) The Martyrdom of St. Bartholomew (fols. 56ra-56vb, 44ra-44va), incomplete I-17) The Acts of St. Matthew (fols. 44va-vb, 48ra-vb, 57ra-57vb), incomplete I-18) The Preaching of St. Thomas (fols. 45ra-45vb), incomplete I-19) The Death of St. John the Son of Zebedee (fols. 46ra-46vb), incomplete I-20) The Martyrdom of St. Luke (fols. 59vb-61vb, 47ra-47rb) I-21) The Preaching of St. Simon the son of Cleopas, surnamed Judas or Nathaniel (fols. 52va-v, 54ra-54vb) I-22) The Martyrdom of St. Simon the son of Cleopas, surnamed Judas or Nathaniel (fol. 54vb), incomplete I-23) The Martyrdom of St. Matthew (fols. 58ra-59va), incomplete I-24) The Acts of St. Thomas, II (fols. 63vb-64vb, 74ra-74vb, 76ra-76vb) I-25) The Acts of St. Thomas, I (fols. 65ra-65vb, 24ra-24vb, 5ra-vb, 63ra-63vb), incomplete I-26) The Acts of St. Thomas, III (fols. 76vb, 66ra-68rb) I-27) The Acts of St. Thomas, IV (fols. 68rb-69vb) I-28) The Acts of St. Thomas, V (fols. 69vb, 25ra-26vb), incomplete I-29) The Preaching of St. Andrew (fols. 71ra-72vb, 31ra-30vb, 75ra-75vb, 11ra-rb), incomplete.

txstates.txstate: The boards and the original sewing are torn off. Most of the folios are misplaced, many are missing (many texts are incomplete). Two leaves have been included in the folder of Ms. MCM-001a (a text concerning St. Thomas). Most of the leaves are affected by humidity, many have stains in the inner upper margins. Many leaves have been damaged by rodents.

bindings.binding: Both boards are missing. Two pairs of sewing stations.

squires.squire: The quire structure cannot be identified due to the poor condition of the Ms.

taunit.ln-info: the number of lines is very irregular: it can be e.g. also 31 (fol. 24r), 32 (fol. 4r), 42 (fol. 76v)
taunit.rl-info:
Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling (a few times also below: e.g., fols. 3v, 23r, 52v). The bottom line is written above the ruling.
Ruled lines have been left empty at the bottom: fols. 15r, 15v, 28r, 45r.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: The handwriting is characterized by tall, thick, right-sloping letters, tending to rounded and bent shapes. Possibly more than one hand was involved in writing (s. e.g., fols. 26v-27r). Some peculiar features: - ዐ and the loops of መ have triangular shape - ጵ has the 6th order marker set up on the vertical stroke at the top, oriented to the left (fols. 10va l.12, 48ra l.14) - the upper horizontal strokes of some letters (e.g., መ ሠ ወ) are slanted to the left - ፮ has the loop open, looking like “compressed” ፯ (e.g., fol. 7rb) - ፪ has in some cases the loops not separated (e.g., fols. 3vb, 4vb); in fol. 23va l.16 the bottom loop is open. - ፬ is triangular, downwards oriented (e.g., fol. 68rb) - the crux ansata and coronis (together) are marking the beginning of texts (fol. 13v) - sentence dividers are accompanied by the paragraph signs.

rubrications.rubrication: Some personal names (fol. 52ra); the trinitarian formula; a few lines in the incipit page of each text, alternating with black lines; sometimes the first line of the account proper; Ethiopic numerals or their elements; elements of the punctuation signs.

otherdetails.otherdetail:
- For each text, the equivalent pages of Budge's Edition (BConAp I, II) and the abbreviations used by Bausi in Annali 2000-2001 (BauGaH) are given here following: I-1) BConAp I, 50-66; BConAp II, 42-57; Dio in BauGaH I-2) BConAp I, 126-34; BConAp II, 122-30; Ph1 in BauGaH I-3) BConAp I, 189-213; BConAp II, 186-211; Jo1 in BauGaH I-4) BConAp I, 156-83; BConAp II, 154-80; AnB in BauGaH I-5) BConAp I, 225-42; BConAp II, 223-40; Ma1 in BauGaH I-6) BConAp I, 247-53; BConAp II, 246-52; JZ1 in BauGaH I-7) BConAp I, 3-6; BConAp II, 2-3; Int in BauGaH I-8) BConAp I, 7-36; BConAp II, 5-25; Pt1 in BauGaH I-9) BConAp I, 37-41, 45-49; BConAp II, 26-34; Pt2 in BauGaH I-10) BConAp I, 70-72; BConAp II, 62-64; Si2 in BauGaH I-11) BConAp I, 73-76; BConAp II, 65-68; Jc1 in BauGaH I-12) BConAp I, 41-45; BConAp II, 35-39; Pa1 in BauGaH I-13) BConAp I, 184-88; BConAp II, 181-85; An2 in BauGaH I-14) BConAp I, 296-306; BConAp II, 296-306; Jud in BauGaH I-15) BConAp I, 243-246; BConAp II, 241-45; Ma2 in BauGaH I-16) BConAp I, 93-100; BConAp II, 87-92; Ba2 in BauGaH I-17) BConAp I, 101-113; BConAp II, 93-108; Mt1 in BauGaH I-18) BConAp I, 265-87; BConAp II, 265-86; Th1 in BauGaH I-19) BConAp I, 214-22; BConAp II, 212-20; Jo2 in BauGaH I-20) BConAp I, 119-25; BConAp II, 115-21; Luc in BauGaH I-21) BConAp I, 67-70; BConAp II, 58-61; Si1 in BauGaH I-22) BConAp I, 70-72; BConAp II, 62-64; Si2 in BauGaH I-23) BConAp I, 114-18; BConAp II, 109-14; Mt2 in BauGaH I-24) BConAp I, 347-57; BConAp II, 347-57; Th4 in BauGaH I-25) BConAp I, 336-46; 335-46; Th3 in BauGaH I-26) BConAp I, 358-67; BConAp II, 358-65; Th5 in BauGaH I-27) BConAp I, 368-73; BConAp II, 366-75; Th6 in BauGaH I-28) BConAp I, 373-81; BConAp II, 376-84; Th7 in BauGaH I-29) BConAp I, 140-56; BConAp II, 137-53; An1 in BauGaH.
- Text I-2: text missing after fol. 2vb = BConAp I, 232 l.13-134. Text I-3: text missing after fol. 62vb and before fol. 3ra = BConAp I, 194 l.6-202 l.18, text missing after fol. 4vb = BConAp I, 208 l.3-213. Text I-5: text missing before fol. 7ra = BConAp I, 225-239 l.5. Text I-8: text missing after fol. 39vb and before fol. 55ra = BConAp I, 24 l.16-28 l.11. Text I-10: text with the first lines missing. Text I-11: text missing after fol. 13vb: BConAp I, 73 l.1-76. Text I-14: text missing before fol. 30ra = BConAp I, 296-298 l.17, fols. missing after fol. 30vb = BConAp I, 301 l.2-306. Text I-15: text missing before fol. 40ra = BConAp I, 243-244 l.3. Text I-16: text missing before fol. 56ra = BConAp I, 93-97 l.11. Text I-17: text missing after fol. 44vb and before 48ra = BConAp I, 102 l.1-107 l.20, text missing after fol. 57vb = BConAp I, 111 l.16-113. Text I-18: text missing before fol. 45ra = BConAp I, 265-274 l.4, fols. missing after 45vb = BConAp I, 276 l.22-87. Text I-19: text missing before fol. 46ra = BConAp I, 214-216 l.1, fols. missing after fol. 46vb = BConAp. 218 l.17-222. Text I-22: except the first lines, all the text is missing. Text I-23: text with the first lines missing. Text I-25: text missing before fol. 65ra = BConAp. I, 336-337 l.5. Text I-28: text with the last lines missing. Text I-29: text missing after fol. 30vb and before fol. 75ra = BConAp. I, 147 l.25-152 l.20.
- According to the distribution of the texts, the Gädlä ḥawaryat of MCM-004 would belong to IV recension (cp. BauGaH, 84-85). Text I-9, the “Martyrdom of St. Peter”, does not contain the “Discourse of Peter on the Cross” (= BConAp I, 45-49; BConAp II, 30-34).

extras.extra: - Corrections written interlineally: fols. 18vb, 43rb, 71ra, 72rb. - Erasures: fols. 16va, 31rb. - Correction written over erasure: fols. 4va, 14va, 14vb, 43ra, 43rb, 56va. - Compressed script: fol. 14va. - Doodles in the margins: fols. 24v, 54r.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: Readings are indicated by the commemoration dates of the Apostles, written in the main hand, in red, in the upper margin: አመ፲ወ፰፡ ለወርኀ፡ ሐምሌ: fol. 13v አመ፡ ፬፡ ለጥር፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ወልደ፡ ዘብዴዎስ፡: fol. 23r አመ፲ወ፯ለሚያዝያ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ወልደ፡ ዘብዴዎስ፡: fol. 41r <…>ቅምት፡ ማቴዎስ: fol. 44v አመ፲፰፡ ለኅዳር፡ ፊ<…>: fol. 47r አመ፡ ፲፡ ለወርኀ፡ ሐምሌ: fol. 52v አመ፳ወ፪፡ ለጥቅምት፡ ሉቃስ: fol. 59v አመ፳ወ፬፡ ለሕዳር፡: fol. 63v አመ፲ወ፬፡ ለመጋቢት: fol. 68r አመ፡ ፩፡ ለሐምሌ፡: fol. 69v አመ፡ ፬፡ ለታሕሣሥ፡ እንድርያስ: fol. 71r አመ፩፡ ለየካቲት፡: fol. 76v.

frames.frame: Fol. 1r (incipit page of Text I-1): coloured (red, black), ornamental band, with three pendants all reaching the middle of the text, with decorations on the top extending to the upper margin of the page (interlaces). Fol. 34r (incipit page of Text I-7): coloured (red, yellow, black), ornamental band, with three pendants all reaching the bottom of the text, with decorations on the top extending to the upper margin of the page (interlaces, crux ansata).
